attributes.additional_details: Make electric scooter legal so teenagers and adult can travel freely, without being scared of getting caught, it would be better for environment and better option for those who don’t have access to car. the insurance for car is so high and for those who can’t afford insurance there should be an alternative so electric scooters are the best alternative as they are really cheap, can get it £200 and it gives range of around 20-25 kilometres so it’s good alternative for those who don’t have a car.
attributes.background: Make electric scooter legal so teenagers and adult can travel to work or school without being dependent on public transport and parents to drop them to school
